instruction: Create a template email to follow-up with a customer after they have made a purchase.
output:
Subject line: Thanks for your purchase!

Dear [Name],

Thank you for your [purchase/order] of [product/service] from [store/company]. We value your business and hope you enjoy your [product/service]. 

If you have any questions about your purchase, please do not hesitate to contact us and we will be more than happy to assist you.

Thank you and have a great day!

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
